definition: rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: He will never beg for his life.
BAT who fell upon the ground and was caught by a Weasel pleaded to be spared hellos life.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠失蹤在地上，被貔子叼去，他請求饒命。

sentences.english: The butcher was furious that the cow had tried to beg for its life.
sentences.chinese: 屠夫因爲老牛曾經求人饒命而勃然大怒。

sentences.english: A bat who fell upon the ground and was caught by a Weasel pleaded to be spared his life.
sentences.chinese: 蝙蝠掉落在地上，被黃鼠狼叼去，他請求饒命。

sentences.english: No flag of truce possible. Men are willing to die, provided their opponent will kill them.
sentences.chinese: 對戰敗者不饒命，沒有談判的可能，人們拼死廝殺。
